name: Impetus
description:
Impetus is a hand-drawn 2D platformer with Smash-esque controls. Over the course of 2 levels, you get to learn intuitive techniques to traverse the course more efficiently. The game gives you a decent amount of freedom to defeat enemies and jump across obstacles.

Impetus was created for our big, last school project and is the first game I've ever created. It lacks in some areas - some of the GUI stuff is a little wonky - but it was fun working on it and it got some good reception! If you have some time to invest, you can get a decent amount out of it. Have fun exploring those options!
